DOC.brief_summary: The follow-up study base previous nutritional intervention trial entitle `` Impact Prenatal Vitamin/Mineral Supplements Perinatal Mortality ( NCT00133744 ) '' . We follow livebirths bear woman trial measure height , weight , hemoglobin implement questionaire survey ( include developmental milestone , disease history , breast feeding , passive smoking , et al ) . We select sub-sample infant assess IQ , emotional behavioral problem , language development status . The outcomes interest include death , body mass index , overweight/ obesity , stunting/ wasting/ thinness , anemia , developmental milestone , IQ , emotional behavioral disorder , language developmental status , disease history . Other interesting exposure include breast feeding , passive smoking , et al . We hypothesize intrauterine nutritional exposure impact offspring 's physical , mental , language development . We also hypothesize cesarean delivery include CDMR impact offspring 's outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Antenatal Iron-contained Multiple Micronutrient Supplementation , Cesarean Delivery , CDMR Child Health
DOC.detailed_description: The follow-up study base previous nutritional intervention trial entitle `` Impact Prenatal Vitamin/Mineral Supplements Perinatal Mortality ( NCT00133744 ) '' . We follow livebirths bear woman trial measure height , weight , hemoglobin implement questionaire survey ( include developmental milestone , disease history , breast feeding , passive smoking , et al ) . We select 1200 < 30 month infant assess IQ Bayley scale , emotional behavioral problem CBCL scale , language development status LDS scale . We also select 1500 > 30 month child measure emotional behavioral problem CBCL scale . The exposure group include intrauterine nutritional exposure cesarean delivery exposure well CDMR . The outcomes interest include death , body mass index , overweight/ obesity , stunting/ wasting/ thinness , anemia , developmental milestone , IQ , emotional behavioral disorder , language developmental status , disease history . Other interesting exposure include breast feeding , passive smoking , et al . We hypothesize intrauterine nutritional exposure impact offspring 's physical , mental , language development . We also hypothesize cesarean delivery include CDMR impact offspring 's outcome .
